General.Name: Unitech Electronics Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automatic identification and data capture technologies worldwide. It provides mobile computer products, such as rugged smartphones, touch computers, industrial PDAs, handheld terminals, enterprise tablets, healthcare mobile computers, wearable computers, touch computers, and mobile clinical assistant; barcode scanners that include linear imager, 2D imager, laser, wireless, pocket, ESD safe, healthcare, and wearable scanners, as well as pen and slot readers; and RFID products, such as reader modules, mobile readers, handheld readers, fixed readers, portable/pocket readers, and antennas. The company also offers intelligent integrated terminals that include IP based biometric terminal; and software solutions, such as MoboLink, a device and data exchange management software, as well as StageGO solutions, a barcode-based device staging solution. It serves its customers in the fields of retail, field services, governments, healthcare, hospitality, logistics and transportation, warehousing, and manufacturing. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Unitech Computer Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 122, Lane 235, Baoqiao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
